channel.title: Shareholder Relations on FinanClub

item.title: TCN
item.description: score:-141 Chances: Tricon Residential Inc. is receiving positive recommendations from leading independent proxy advisory firms ISS and Glass Lewis for a statutory plan of arrangement. The company has announced consolidated financial results that indicate strong performance for the three and twelve months ended December 31, 2023.
